about_the_game:
Siege and Summon is an online turn-based competitive card game set in the Three Kingdoms era. Players can use soldier cards and skill cards to build a deck of cards to challenge powerful players in the world of the Three Kingdoms. NPCs can also fight against other players and form teams to challenge dungeons.

Game features
◆ Card deck: Players can use soldier cards and skill cards to build their own deck for battle. Soldier cards are divided into: ordinary, elite, and hero. Two ordinary cards can be put into battle; other cards can be put into battle one. The deck can contain up to 30 cards, which can include soldier cards and skill cards.

◆How to play: Players use their respective decks to fight on a 3*10 field. The enemy and we take turns taking action until the opponent's general or our general is defeated.

◆ Profession: Players can freely choose among 4 professions: Swordsman, Dharma Lord, Taoist Saint, and Divine Arrow; each deck can only use the same profession card.

◆ Push pictures: After building a deck, players can engage in push battles to fight against NPC decks with their own characteristics; push pictures to obtain protagonist experience, copper coins and various treasure chests; and only push pictures can obtain advanced professional cards.

◆Competition: After the arena is opened, you can compete with other players, and it is endless fun to fight with others; the arena is settled quarterly, and each quarter is based on the player's points ranking. The top players can get the soldier card that will be launched next season.

◆ Team formation: After the team dungeon is opened, you can form a team with other players to challenge high-difficulty dungeons; the dungeons are divided into three difficulty levels: simple, normal, and difficult. The higher the difficulty, the greater the benefits.
